document.full_text: prosecutors on wednesday charged a man with the murders of three teenage girls he met on telephone chat lines and asked the public for help identifying what they fear are other victims of the serial killer.
document.title: prosecutors charge chicago man in serial killing spree
lines_and_colors: prosecutors on wednesday charged a man with the murders of three teenage girls he met on telephone chat lines and asked the public for help identifying what they fear are other victims of the serial killer.
